DOC.brief_title: A Multi Center Study Validate Condition-specific Measure Sexual Health Women With Pelvic Floor Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: 600 woman present care urogynecology clinic United States England recruit participate . They give data regard physical exam , include measurement Pelvic Organ Prolapse Quantification exam medical surgical history . In addition , complete validate questionnaire include Incontinence Severity Index , Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory ( short form ) question # 35 Epidemiology Prolapse Incontinence Questionnaire . All woman also complete two sexual health questionnaire ; Female Sexual Function Index Pelvic Organ Prolapse Urinary Incontinence Sexual Questionnaire ( Revised ) . Women receive standard care pelvic floor disorder . They recontacted repeat set questionnaire determine responsiveness new measure . Reliability questionnaire measure subset woman complete questionnaire twice ; factor analysis perform determine underlying factor structure . Responses QOL measure compare new instrument establish validity .
